## Installation

<Npm pkg="@sjsf/flowbite3-theme@next" />

:::note

This is `flowbite-svelte@next` based theme (Tailwind v4).

:::

### Install Flowbite Svelte v3

<LinkButton href="https://next.flowbite-svelte.com/docs/pages/quickstart" variant='secondary' target="_blank" icon="external" >
  Quickstart - Flowbite Svelte
</LinkButton>

### Configuration

Register the theme source path by adding a line like this to the `app.css` file.

`@source "../node_modules/@sjsf/flowbite3-theme/dist";`

</FormCard>
